html:
Commercial Computing

You will work in a small team to produce an application in response to the needs of a third-party client. The module gives you the ownership of the project management as well as the development of a solution to the brief, within which not only must you aim to satisfy and exceed the clients’ needs, but you must also consider and apply the relevant Legal, Social, Ethical, and Professional Issues.

Learning Objectives:

+  Discuss the Legal, Ethical, Professional, Social Issues, Software Testing Standards, and Cybersecurity Issues of working within the Computer Industry.

+  Present Your Personal Profile in an appropriate Professional Format.

+  Collaborate with other Specialists to effectively Research, Co-Ordinate, Develop and Present a Computer-Based Solution for a given Business Scenario.

+  Reflect on the Practical Experience of Applying Project Management Theory and Collaborative Working to a Live Project.

Module Content:
